TEXT.English: Shows the worker automation settings for individual settings. Close and reopen the menu to see the changes take affect.
TEXT.French: Shows the worker automation settings for individual settings. Close and reopen the menu to see the changes take affect.
TEXT.German: Shows the worker automation settings for individual settings. Close and reopen the menu to see the changes take affect.
TEXT.Italian: Shows the worker automation settings for individual settings. Close and reopen the menu to see the changes take affect.
TEXT.Spanish: Shows the worker automation settings for individual settings. Close and reopen the menu to see the changes take affect.
TEXT.Finnish: Shows the worker automation settings for individual settings. Close and reopen the menu to see the changes take affect.

TEXT.English: Units will avoid any encounters with hostile enemies
TEXT.French: Les Unités vont éviter toute rencontre avec les unités ennemies hostiles
TEXT.German: Units will avoid any encounters with hostile enemies
TEXT.Italian: Units will avoid any encounters with hostile enemies
TEXT.Spanish: Units will avoid any encounters with hostile enemies
TEXT.Finnish: Units will avoid any encounters with hostile enemies

TEXT.English: Units will avoid going near to barbarian cities and encampments
TEXT.French: Les Unités vont éviter de se déplacer près des Villes et campements barbares
TEXT.German: Units will avoid going near to barbarian cities and encampments
TEXT.Italian: Units will avoid going near to barbarian cities and encampments
TEXT.Spanish: Units will avoid going near to barbarian cities and encampments
TEXT.Finnish: Units will avoid going near to barbarian cities and encampments

TEXT.English: Hides the Automate Pillage icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.French: Masque l'icone de Pillage automatisé de la liste des actions des unités.
TEXT.German: Hides the Automate Pillage icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Italian: Hides the Automate Pillage icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides the Automate Pillage icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides the Automate Pillage icon from the unit interface.

TEXT.English: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.French: Les Units seront incapable d'attaquer ou de capturer les villes ennemies.
TEXT.German: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.Italian: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.Spanish: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.Finnish: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.

TEXT.English: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.French: Les Units seront incapable d'attaquer ou de capturer les villes ennemies.
TEXT.German: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.Italian: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.Spanish: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.
TEXT.Finnish: Units will be unable to attack or capture enemy cities, no matter the odds.

TEXT.English: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.French: Les Groupes importants d'unités peuvent sacrifier une unité plus faible pour affaiblier l'ennemi
TEXT.German: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.Italian: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.Spanish: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.Finnish: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills

TEXT.English: Hides the Automate Hunt icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.French: Masque l'icone de Traque automatisée de la liste des actions des unités.
TEXT.German: Hides the Automate Hunt icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Italian: Hides the Automate Hunt icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides the Automate Hunt icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides the Automate Hunt icon from the unit interface.

TEXT.French: Prob. de Combat Minimum pour Attaquer :

TEXT.English: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.
TEXT.French: La Prob. de combat minimum à laquelle une unité va engager l'ennemie. Les Probabilité plus faible augmente le combat et l'expérience, mais également les chances de périr.
TEXT.German: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.
TEXT.Italian: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.
TEXT.Spanish: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.
TEXT.Finnish: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.

TEXT.English: Units can leave friendly borders to attack enemy units skirting the edges. Even with this options, units will turn back after going three tiles from a friendly border.
TEXT.French: Les Unités peuvent quitter l'intérieur des frontières pour attaque des unités ennemies proches. Même avec cette option, les unités reviendrons dans le territoire au bout de trois cases.
TEXT.German: Units can leave friendly borders to attack enemy units skirting the edges. Even with this options, units will turn back after going three tiles from a friendly border.
TEXT.Italian: Units can leave friendly borders to attack enemy units skirting the edges. Even with this options, units will turn back after going three tiles from a friendly border.
TEXT.Spanish: Units can leave friendly borders to attack enemy units skirting the edges. Even with this options, units will turn back after going three tiles from a friendly border.
TEXT.Finnish: Units can leave friendly borders to attack enemy units skirting the edges. Even with this options, units will turn back after going three tiles from a friendly border.

TEXT.English: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.French: Les Groupes importants d'unités peuvent sacrifier une unité plus faible pour affaiblier l'ennemi
TEXT.German: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.Italian: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.Spanish: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills
TEXT.Finnish: Larger groups of units may sacrifice a weaker unit to soften up the enemy for easier kills

TEXT.English: Hides the Automate Patrol icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.French: Masque l'icone de patrouille automatisée de la liste des actions des unités.

TEXT.Italian: Hides the Automate Patrol icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides the Automate Patrol icon from the unit interface.

TEXT.French: Prob. de Combat Minimum pour Attaquer :

TEXT.English: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.
TEXT.French: La Prob. de combat minimum à laquelle une unité va engager l'ennemie. Les Probabilité plus faible augmente le combat et l'expérience, mais également les chances de périr.

TEXT.Finnish: The minimum odds that a unit will engage an enemy with. Lower odds increases fighting, but also the chances of death.

TEXT.English: Units can leave their current city, to shore up defenses in weaker or threatened cities. A unit will never leave a city if it the only defender.
TEXT.French: Les Unités peuvent quitter leur Ville, pour aller supporter la défense d'un ville menacée ou plus faible. Une unité ne quittera jamais la ville si elle est le seul défenseur.
TEXT.German: Units can leave their current city, to shore up defenses in weaker or threatened cities. A unit will never leave a city if it the only defender.
TEXT.Italian: Units can leave their current city, to shore up defenses in weaker or threatened cities. A unit will never leave a city if it the only defender.
TEXT.Spanish: Units can leave their current city, to shore up defenses in weaker or threatened cities. A unit will never leave a city if it the only defender.
TEXT.Finnish: Units can leave their current city, to shore up defenses in weaker or threatened cities. A unit will never leave a city if it the only defender.

TEXT.English: Automate Air Strike and Air Bomb Options:
TEXT.German: Automate Air Strike and Air Bomb Options:
TEXT.Italian: Automate Air Strike and Air Bomb Options:
TEXT.Spanish: Automate Air Strike and Air Bomb Options:
TEXT.Finnish: Automate Air Strike and Air Bomb Options:

TEXT.English: Aircraft can air patrol when in peacetime, or nessecary.
TEXT.French: Les Avions peuvent patrouiller en temps de paix ou lorsque nécessaire.
TEXT.German: Aircraft can air patrol when in peacetime, or nessecary.
TEXT.Italian: Aircraft can air patrol when in peacetime, or nessecary.
TEXT.Spanish: Aircraft can air patrol when in peacetime, or nessecary.
TEXT.Finnish: Aircraft can air patrol when in peacetime, or nessecary.

TEXT.English: Hides the Automate Air Strike and Automate Air Bomb icons from the unit interface.
TEXT.French: Masque l'icone des Opérations Aériennes automatisées de la liste des actions des unités.
TEXT.German: Hides the Automate Air Strike and Automate Air Bomb icons from the unit interface.
TEXT.Italian: Hides the Automate Air Strike and Automate Air Bomb icons from the unit interface.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides the Automate Air Strike and Automate Air Bomb icons from the unit interface.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides the Automate Air Strike and Automate Air Bomb icons from the unit interface.

TEXT.English: Aircraft can rebase into other cities, moving to fronts of action, as needed.
TEXT.French: Les Avions peuvent se réaffecter vers d'autres Villes, se déplaçant près du front si nécessaire.
TEXT.German: Aircraft can rebase into other cities, moving to fronts of action, as needed.
TEXT.Italian: Aircraft can rebase into other cities, moving to fronts of action, as needed.
TEXT.Spanish: Aircraft can rebase into other cities, moving to fronts of action, as needed.
TEXT.Finnish: Aircraft can rebase into other cities, moving to fronts of action, as needed.

TEXT.English: Hides the Automate Upgrade icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.French: Masque l'icone d'amélioration automatisé de la liste des actions des unités.
TEXT.German: Hides the Automate Upgrade icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Italian: Hides the Automate Upgrade icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides the Automate Upgrade icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides the Automate Upgrade icon from the unit interface.

TEXT.English: The Most Expensive Units will be Upgraded First.
TEXT.French: Les Unités où le prix d'amélioration est le plus élevé sont prioritaires.
TEXT.German: The Most Expensive Units will be Upgraded First.
TEXT.Italian: The Most Expensive Units will be Upgraded First.
TEXT.Spanish: The Most Expensive Units will be Upgraded First.
TEXT.Finnish: The Most Expensive Units will be Upgraded First.

TEXT.English: The Most Experienced Units will be Upgraded First. If Most Expensive is enabled, it will take precedence.
TEXT.French: Les Unités ayant la plus grande expérience sont prioritaires.
TEXT.German: The Most Experienced Units will be Upgraded First. If Most Expensive is enabled, it will take precedence.
TEXT.Italian: The Most Experienced Units will be Upgraded First. If Most Expensive is enabled, it will take precedence.
TEXT.Spanish: The Most Experienced Units will be Upgraded First. If Most Expensive is enabled, it will take precedence.
TEXT.Finnish: The Most Experienced Units will be Upgraded First. If Most Expensive is enabled, it will take precedence.

TEXT.English: The minimum amount of gold that must be in your nation's treasury before any units will be auto-upgraded.
TEXT.French: Le montant d'or minimum qu'il doit y avoir dans votre trésor pour commencer l'automatisation de l'amélioration.
TEXT.German: The minimum amount of gold that must be in your nation's treasury before any units will be auto-upgraded.
TEXT.Italian: The minimum amount of gold that must be in your nation's treasury before any units will be auto-upgraded.
TEXT.Spanish: The minimum amount of gold that must be in your nation's treasury before any units will be auto-upgraded.
TEXT.Finnish: The minimum amount of gold that must be in your nation's treasury before any units will be auto-upgraded.

TEXT.German: Hides the Automate Promote icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Italian: Hides the Automate Promote icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Spanish: Hides the Automate Promote icon from the unit interface.
TEXT.Finnish: Hides the Automate Promote icon from the unit interface.

TEXT.English: (Disabling a build option nationally overrides any city settings!)
